description: Updates an existing DNSSEC validation configuration. If there is no existing DNSSEC validation configuration, one is created.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) that you're updating the DNSSEC validation status for.

parameters.name: Validation
parameters.description: The new value that you are specifying for DNSSEC validation for the VPC. The value can be ENABLE or DISABLE. Be aware that it can take time for a validation status change to be completed.

nested_items.name: ResolverDNSSECConfig
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains settings for the specified DNSSEC configuration.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID for a configuration for DNSSEC validation.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner account ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) for a configuration for DNSSEC validation.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) that you're configuring the DNSSEC validation status for.

nested_items.name: ValidationStatus
nested_items.description: The validation status for a DNSSEC configuration. The status can be one of the following:
